original_definition: 'primary owner of the data' means the entity which creates the data;
generated_definition: 'primary owner of the data' means the person or entity that has control over the collection, processing, and dissemination of data and determines its purposes and means of processing.

Article 2: ‘primary owner of the data’ means the entity which creates the data;
‘planned’ means an event known ex ante by theprimary owner of the data;

Article 7: Theconsumption units shall be considered asprimary owner of the data they submit.
The consumption units shall be considered as primary owner of the data they submit.
Article 18: The liability of theprimary owner of the data, thedata provider and the ENTSO for Electricity under this Regulation shall be limited to cases of gross negligence and/or wilful misconduct. In any event they shall not be liable to compensate the person who uses the data for any loss of profit, loss of business, or any other indirect incidental, special or consequential damages of any kind arising from a breach of their obligations under this Regulation.
